name: 2023 4th International Conference on Education Development and Studies
content: Conference Proceedings: ICEDS welcomes the submissions from on innovative work from researchers in work from researchers in academic, industry and government describing original research work in Education Development and Studies. Accepted excellent papers by ICEDS 2023 will be published in the conference proccedings, which will be collected in the conference proceedings, and then indexed by Ei Compendex, and Scopus, etc. major databases.
